@ClarkeAtAmerica @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli I don't know what the "debacle" is, yet. There's more to come, and I'll reserve my judgement till then.

@ClarkeAtAmerica @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli I work with the poor, new immigrants and the imprisoned.  Privately.  Not publicly representing myself as "Senior Editor and Chief Correspondent" of America Magazine.

@NHBullmoose @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli So you are, let me get this straight, more offended that I used the expression ‚Äúcrotch simple‚Äù than the debacle I was referring to? I‚Äôd say that‚Äôs a fairly disordered hierarchy of offensiveness.
@NHBullmoose @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli ? Yeah like a gazillion other people who have jobs with imperfect institutions. Where do you work?

@ClarkeAtAmerica @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli I think that your role as "senior editor and chief correspondent" of America Magazine holds you to a higher standard than public toilet humor.  But that's just pearl clutching, I guess.

@NHBullmoose @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli You have got to be kidding me. Do you seriously think his role as a politician excuses everything? What kind of ethical orbit do you wobble in? And you have the audacity to scold me?
@ClarkeAtAmerica @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli And you still cash your check, huh?
@ClarkeAtAmerica @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli He's a politician, not the "Senior editor and chief correspondent" for America Magazine.  Maybe try to live up to your business card.
@NHBullmoose @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli Yes, that indicts the entire hierarchy

@NHBullmoose @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli Just cease the pearl clutching. I‚Äôm not the one who climbed into bed on camera. Why don‚Äôt you go share your thoughts on classy behavior with Rudy?
@ClarkeAtAmerica @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli I know- striving for holiness and to clear a higher bar is so OUT these days.  I should get with it, like you, obviously.
@NHBullmoose @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli Oh palaver
@ClarkeAtAmerica @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli Again, that's the bar you measure yourself against?  You're employed by the Jesuits- hold yourself to a higher standard.

@NHBullmoose @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli What is vulgar about me pointing out that there is every reason to believe that this political clown car is full of men who can be easily compromised? Seriously, the only vulgarity here is what Rudy was up to, and there is nothing I can say that can add a penny to that.
@NHBullmoose @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli He‚Äôs only publicly cheated on every woman he was ever married‚Äîall three of them‚Äîbut do go on

@NHBullmoose @americamag @VillanovaU @MassimoFaggioli You‚Äôre right. We should def be more classy like Giuliani and other Trump stringers and hangers on. Nothing vulgar there at all.
